textBeforeTable: Pennsylvania holiday entertainment all employers See the complete Zambelli Fireworks profile Zambelli Fireworks - Zambelli Fireworks is a New Castle, PA company that offers an experience that “can be seen in the faces of the spectators and heard in the oohs and ahs of the crowd.” Companies with Entry Level Jobs and Internships in Holiday This tag contains the companies that have been featured on holidays. Here at One Day, One Job we love holidays. We’ve featured a number of companies on holidays, from Christmas and Thanksgiving to smaller holidays like Pi Day and Earth Day. Even ODOJ founder Willy Franzen’s birthday has inspired several daily posts. A few other holidays that get featured regularly include Memorial Day, Independence Day, Memorial Day, and Valentine’s Day.
